name: Roguelike Jam March 2022
description:
In the near future, your human has been infected with a rouge nanobot swarm that's taking over their body. You play a lone immune system nanobot traveling through your human's body, fighting back against the swarm.

Built for the Roguelike Jam March 2022, with the theme Unstable.

In this version:

  • basic gameplay loop
  • as you progress through the levels there are more enemies spawned on each run
  • player has a fixed light and heavy attack
  • enemies come in 3 varieties, with different attack types

Things we didn't finish in time for the jam:

  • Souls-like XP gain for killing enemies that can be banked at upgrade 'campfires'
  • Spending XP on upgrades  (or gambling on carrying on to get more XP to get better upgrades)
  • the 'Unstable' theme element where each level the player and enemies get a random buff/debuff
